channel.title: Travis Martin's Blog
channel.description: A list of articles written by Travis Martin.

item.title: Crash Course: Computer Vision
item.description: The companion article for my presentation on computer vision and Lunabotics.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: The Dungeon
item.description: An in-depth look at the first computer role-playing game, including a review of my world record speedrun.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: Fast Inverse Square Root
item.description: An explanation of the famous fast inverse square root algorithm as it is implemented in Quake III Arena.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: Esoteric JavaScript
item.description: A guide on how to write any JavaScript program with just six unique characters.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: WebGL2 Tutorial
item.description: The table of contents for my WebGL2 tutorial series.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: Story Rating System
item.description: The rating system I use for stories and literature.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)

item.title: MTG Deck Building Compendium
item.description: A summary of my knowledge about deck building for Magic: The Gathering.
item.author: tjmartin2003@gmail.com (Travis Martin)
